title: Historic Savannah Downtown Escape with US$30 Daily Dining Credit & Rooftop Pool
description:
Standing proudly in the heart of Georgia's oldest city, this landmark hotel - a member of the Historic Hotels of America group - has been reimagined for the modern traveller while preserving its storied legacy as Savannah's 'Empress of the South.'

Home to three dining venues that showcase the diversity of Southern coastal cuisine - including bourbon bar Edgar's Proof & Provision, inventive show kitchen 1540 Room and laidback cafe Buffalo Bayou - there's nowhere better to become acquainted with the region's cherished tradition of hospitality.

Positioned in Savannah's Historic District, you'll be within easy reach of moss-draped trees, magnificent mansions and boutique shopping along Broughton Street.  Explore the nearby SCAD Museum and historic homes renowned for the eerie intrigue of ghost tours and the natural beauty of Forsyth Park. 

Venture a bit further to Tybee Island, Wormsloe State Historic Site, or a scenic river cruise-all within easy reach. Return to the hotel's spectacular rooftop pool terrace and tropical-inspired Spa Cabana.
offer_address: 15 East Liberty Street, Savannah, Georgia 31401, United States

title: Sauve Savannah Hotel Boasting Prime Historic District Location
description: Outside you're surrounded by antebellum Southern beauty, inside mix it up with modern flair at The Kimpton Brice Hotel. Enjoy stylish spacious rooms offering mutiple views at different angles of Washington Square, historic downtown or the outdoor garden pool. Treat yourself to a relaxed ambience at the Pacci Italian Kitchen + Bar or lounge poolside with a specially made cocktail in hand after a day out on the town exploring.
location_description: Kimpton Brice Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 601 East Bay Street, Savannah, Georgia, GA 31401, United States

title: Boutique European Elegance in Georgia's Historic District
